basic.blooming: Succulent plants, sometimes flowers, yellow flowers

maintenance.soil: Peat and akadama mixed in 3:1 ratio
maintenance.sunlight: Likes light, avoid strong light, put in places with scattered light in summer
maintenance.watering: Water thoroughly when soil is dry, reduce water during decrustation in summer
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply once every 1-2 months in spring and autumn
maintenance.pruning: Remove dead and rotten part timely
